ygData.subject: Losing Pets
ygData.msgSnippet: I just joined the list today so I don t know what all you have discussed. But I do know that losing our pet would be a HUGH detriment to our class and I can t
ygData.messageBody:
I just joined the list today so I don't know what all you have discussed.
But I do know that losing our pet would be a HUGH detriment to our class and
I can't imagine what they would give us to compinsate. I don't think I
could have ever done enough damage to kill an Orc Centurian. Featherweight
would be very cool but would help others a lot more than us. They would
have to give us something REALLY good to make up for taking away our pets if
they decided to do that. Although I can see it in one place. The Race Wars
server. We will RULE the race war server. With the ablitity to blind,
root, and change forms we can effectivly be that assassins of the Race War.
That, or if you choose we are the only class that can travel anywhere and
not be attacked as some as someone sees us.

Mark

Amazing $14,000 Opportunity. Click below for details.
http://www.9898.com/mreed
